p: Benzodioxoles are important compounds in medicinal chemistry and many drugs with this structural skeleton and different therapeutic effects have been marketed ( Wang et al., 2013; Chen et al., 2013). In addition, more biological effects such as anticancer, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, immune modulatory and antihypertensive effects ofthis group of compounds have been observed ( Dawood et al., 2019).
